'''Chaz''' was injured when [[Petey]] opened fire on the restaurant where he works.

==History==
Chaz was working at a restaurant when he was shot by a disgruntled ex-employee, [[Petey]].

==Career==
Chaz works at a restaurant. At some point, [[Brad Ackles]] suggested he go for management, but he decided not to.
